Core Values

Striving to Serve Students the R.I.G.H.T Way

Actions are predicated upon values. Inasmuch as we commit ourselves to values that are in harmony with correct principles, our influence for good is limitless. We have embraced the following as our core values. They serve as anchors, the pillars upon which all else is in the program stands.

As RMUoHP-PAP team members, we strive to think, make decisions, and act in accordance with these fundamental values. As well, we strongly emphasize their importance and encourage their adoption, to every student who we have the privilege of teaching and mentoring.

R - Relationships Come First

Nothing is more important than our relationships with others. People are more important than things. It is people who give care, and people who receive care. At RMUoHP-PAP, people come first.

I - It’s All About the Team

Time and again we see the evidence. Collective decision-making is superior to independent decision-making. Whether it be in health care, education, business, or anything else, the team approach proves best. At RMUoHP-PAP, we emphasize teamwork in all things.

G - Gotta Think of the Patient

The medical world is remarkably complex. So many dynamics, so many considerations. Unfortunately, in the midst of the chaos, thinking about and doing what’s best for the patient can slip to the back burner. At RMUoHP-PAP, we keep the patient front and center. The patient comes first. Always.

H - High Expectations

Yes, we are here to serve students. But more importantly, we are here to serve the patients whom our students will serve. Without high expectations, we risk compromising the education of our students, and thus ultimately the care of their patients. RMUoHP-PAP will always hold the threshold high. The patient deserves nothing but our best.

T - Take Time for Every Person

People come from all walks of life and carry with them unique backgrounds, personalities, philosophies, perspectives, and opinions. They stand as products of the infinite number of combinations that result from genetic diversity, social milieu, environmental influence, and personal choice. At RMUoHP-PAP, we regard each individual as an equal member of the human family, and therefore strive to serve each with our utmost attention.

Education without values, as useful as it is, seems rather to make man a more clever devil.

~ C.S. Lewis
